message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  Given its value and features, I'm asking for $20,000.  I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate the enthusiasm, but $20,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to consider a price of $15,000

Bob, thanks for your interest and counteroffer.  While $20,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $18,000. I believe this price reflects a fair deal considering the product's worth.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $18,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to consider a price of $14,000
